about_the_game:
The Demo contains a few playable maps with different game types where you can try the combat systems and different characters. The multiplayer and other features will be available in the full version when released.

Nine playable Legendary characters:

1) Orc-Warrior - Deals significant damage. Equipped with a one-handed axe. Can run quite fast but for a short distance.
2) Praetorian Knight - Balanced warrior. Equipped with a two-handed sword and heavy armor.
3) Fire Mage - Powerful fire magic. Stamina regen from successful fire arrow hits.
4) Dwarf - Big damage, not really fast.
5) Werewolf - Uses hits claws as a weapon. Can sprint fast and for a long time, has fast regeneration.
6) Rogue - Equipped with a bow and a one-handed sword. Performs quick rolls instead of dodges.
7) Guardian - Heavy knight. Carries a big shield which can defend from any damage before been destroyed.
8) Raider - Faster then dwarf but deals less damage.
9) Ent - literally a walking tree. Even simple attacks can push enemy backward for a moment. Ground strike instead of leg kick.

Three different maps to try combat system and game types:

Lost Camp (Duel) - where you can try plying for any character 1 vs 1 against the AI of different strength and complexity.
Town (Team Deathmatch) - two teams fighting against each other, each kill gives one point to the team, the team that reaches the required amount of points wins.
Arena (Control) - Capture and control the objectives to get points. The team that will reach the maximum amount of points wins.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains combat with melee weapons like swords, spikes, bows, fire magic. The effects are visualized with blood and voice lines. No gore is presented.
